body_html:
Wait, why are you running sudo ./configure ?
You are running ./configure and bazel build ... as different users.

Please check out the tensorflow repository to a folder your user can write to, and then run ./configure without sudo.
body_text:
Wait, why are you running sudo ./configure ?
You are running ./configure and bazel build ... as different users.
Please check out the tensorflow repository to a folder your user can write to, and then run ./configure without sudo.
body:
Wait, why are you running `sudo ./configure` ?
You are running `./configure` and `bazel build ...` as different users.

Please check out the tensorflow repository to a folder your user can write to, and then run ./configure without sudo.
